summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1928, for the improvement of Thirty-second Avenue from Yesler Way to East Union Street, and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues therein named, by grading and paving the same; together with the necessary water mains of proper dimensions and materials and proper sewerage connections, under Ordinance No. 19846, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
